title: Episode 273: Fermented Man
description: On this week's episode of Eat Your Words, host Cathy Erway talks to Derek Dellinger, the author of the homebrew and craft beer blog Bear Flavored, a contributing writer to the Upstate Brew York magazine and a homebrew advisor to Beacon Homebrew. Listen in as they discuss Derek's career, his year long fermented-foods diet, his thoughts on soda and much more.
author: info@heritageradionetwork.org (Heritage Radio Network)
